page.title: 06Our Hopes And Fears
page.content: I see the jet aeroplanes go overhead and the modern equipment in houses, with videos and microwave ovens becoming more popular.Man is sending astronauts to the moon and becoming very clever,yet in 1985 we have all this unemployment. This causes uncertainty and is a stress factor giving heart problems and other diseases.We worry whether it will all end in a nuclear war. We all hope our sons and daughters will find employment by the time they leave school.We hope to see less violence which builds up because of the pent-up energy of youth due to unemployment. The people in jobs get colossal wages compared with yesteryear and regard themselves as lucky.Ido not think people work as hard or for such long hours,but I wish they could all find work.
